participant_1.background:
I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.
My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about medicine and dust allergies.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the Midwest, where I learned to love the arts and crafts.
I am a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films.
i play music in my spare time.
I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others.
my favorite place to visit is seattle.

content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of animals, especially dogs. I volunteer at my local animal shelter. What are your favorite animals?
Hi there! I love cats and dogs, but my favorite animal is probably the red panda. They're so cute and fluffy!
I've never seen a red panda in person, but I've seen pictures. They are so adorable!
They really are! I love their little faces and their big ears.
I'm glad to meet someone else who loves animals. I wish more people did.
Me too! Animals make the world a better place.
I agree. They're so cute and cuddly. I'm always happy to see a dog or cat.
Me too! I love petting dogs and cats. They're so friendly and loving.
I think they're the best pets. They're always happy to see you and they love to play.
I agree. They're the perfect companions.
I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too! I'm always happy to talk about animals.
Me too! I could talk about them all day long.
Me too! I think we'd make great friends.
Maybe we can meet up sometime and talk about animals?
That would be great! I'd love to meet you and talk about animals.
Me too! I'll message you and we can figure out a time to meet.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it
